name: Jamie of the Thrones
description:
/!\ Game of Thrones Spoiler !!! /!\

The game is based on the Game of Thrones season 6 episode 8.
Edmure this time did not agree to surrender the castle to Jamies and you have to make Black Fish change it mind: Jamie style ;)

(The jam was a quicky style: 10H max to make the game.)

The game was made during the Gamejam of Thrones in Brussels ( (http://goo.gl/QVGh)

The game ;)

Credit : Fabien Hache, Emile Sonneveld, Strée Eloi.
Spherical Image - RICOH THETA
